General.Name: Xiamen Red Phase Instruments Inc
General.Description: Red phase INC. provides power grid systems, power generation systems, and other products worldwide. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Red Phase Instruments Inc. and changed its name to Red phase INC. in February 2018. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

2.Name: Ms. Xi Jiao  Li
2.Title: Sec. of the Board & Deputy GM
